overview: It's time to take a break from the life of the city and check in to the Ramitall Inn. With lush landscaping, rolling hills and vast forests awaiting, this is a vacation you will not soon forget. A naked trail hike leads to one lucky guy taking seven hot, creamy loads of man lava. A visit to the bar leads to an erotic afternoon and it's all one hundred percent bareback action. Both indoors and out, it's all about sex!
title: Ramitall Inn
